text:
Fiona's place was perfectly sized for one, with ample living area and closet space, and comfortable air conditioning and window shades to keep everything cool during the day. There wasn't a hair dryer available at first, but Fiona brought one over right away when I inquired, which was great. The bed is a wee bit short if you're tall, but still very comfortable to sleep on.

I was easily able to park right out front for easy car access, or stroll through the neighborhood to get downtown/further explore the east side on foot. Overall, a great little place, and a wonderful weekend in Austin!
title: Sweet, Sexy Studio in the '02
